channel.title: Racing for boys on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Racing for boys on Game6r

item.title: Horse Racing
item.description: Do you want to take part in the races? Then rather start the process of playing horse racing for boys. First you will need to choose a horse and come up with a name for it. Then you can go to the hippodrome. At the bottom of the screen, two scales are displayed: one shows the speed, and the other shows the energy level.
